summary: Added a small castle home near Riverwood for Augh's Lain Follower
descriptionHtml:
This is an addition to the excellent mod[color=#0000ff] "Lain - a simple Follower" created by Augh.[/color]

You can get it here:[color=#1e84cc] https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/91149[/color]

Added a small castle home for Augh's Lain Follower, near Riverwood (to the northwest) map marker for fast travel (see pics).

Install: just replace original ESP file with this one.


[color=#1e84cc]Version 2[/color]:Â  Lain's Castle (Legend of the Eagles Nest Compatible), new location northeast of Riverwood, see pic of map marker.
author: Augh
